Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two donor - acceptor ( D-A ) copolymers , PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO , using 4,naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene as an electron - rich unit and benzodiathiazole ( BT ) or benzoxadiazole(BO) as an electron - deficient one , were designed and synthesized via a Pd - catalyzed Stillecoupling method.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| 4,naphtho[1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene |
| benzodiathiazole (BT) |
| benzoxadiazole (BO) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| benzodiathiazole (BT) |
| benzoxadiazole (BO) |

I hope this corrected response meets your requirements.
